title: Bloomberg Markets: How Quant Fund Crisis Will Likely Play Out
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: How Quant Fund Crisis Will Likely Play Out
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Aaron Brown Former Risk Manager AQR Capital Management Discussing institutional quant hedge funds have addressed the risk issues that caused 2007 losses, but the newer retail products cannot. Bloomberg Prophets are professionals offering actionable insights on markets, the economy and monetary policy. Contributors may have a stake in the areas they write about.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
